scripts.db:check: printf "ğŸ” Ensuring db is ready..." && docker-compose up db-wait &>/dev/null && echo ğŸ
scripts.db:generate: npm run -s db:check && npx prisma generate
scripts.db:migration:create: npm run -s db:check && npx prisma migrate dev --name
scripts.db:migrate: npm run -s db:check && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:reset: npm run -s db:check && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:seed: npm run -s db:check && npx prisma db seed --preview-feature
scripts.init: env-cmd npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
